__e: Her beast is still here, stuck in her head.
And I know it was my idea, but if this beast is still out there, then...
You didn't ask to become a beast, and you haven't done anything wrong-- in fact, you've done nothing but good ever since, and that's why I've been there for you, why we've all been there for you.
Do you mean that he's a beast during the night, and returns to being a man with the daylight?
I guess... sensing a beast again for the first time in a very long time-- it made me feel like I used to, before you, before us.
Sensing a beast again for the first time in a very long time, it made me feel like I used to.
We're here, so The Beast is in the next street.
Don't you know the Beast is afoot here?
If I'm a beast, it's because you made me one
You're a beast, not a man!
He's a lovely animal, but I'm scared.
That ends it. That critter gives me no peace.
Well, if you're an animal that can talk maybe I can learn something from you?
It's been a while since I beasted out.
You've made me so furious that I forget what I'm thinking!
So the beast has a son.
- There is something wrong with the creature.
